version_description:
Ability to create multiple word lists and manage them (copy,select,arrange,…)
Ability to sync all word lists across multiple devices with Dropbox
Search words across all words list (History, Notes, …)
Ability to shuffle/edit flash cards
Ability to change image if the image doesn’t match
Faster offline sound downloading
Ability to change speed of flashcards
Option to enable/disable auto hide bottom bar
Minor improvements + bugfixes
